T02D2576:41a-1: manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti bi dhe go ma p'a sho dha ya n'a ma /
T02D2576:41a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2576:41a-4: pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
T02D2576:41a-5: zhes bya ba / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2576:41a-6: mi shes dri ma sel mdzad cing //
T02D2576:41a-7: shes rab ye shes spyan 'byed pa'i //
T02D2576:41a-9: ses can ngan song rnam sbyong ba'i //
T02D2576:41a-10: cho ga tshe 'das la phan pa //
T02D2576:41a-11: gzhan gyi don du bshad par bya //
T02D2576:41a-12: de la 'dir gza' dang skar ma bzang po bkra
T02D2576:41a-13: shis pa'i nyi ma la tshul dang mthun pa'i dkyil
T02D2576:41a-14: 'khor dang 'brel pa 'am ma 'brel kyang rung ste
T02D2576:41a-15: / phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas bzang por sa bslang
T02D2576:41a-16: ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sa'i rgyar
T02D2576:41a-17: khru bcu drug pa la gru bzhir byas te /
T02D2576:41a-18: dbus su de'i phyir gyi tshad kyis tshad kyis zlum
T02D2576:41a-19: por bskor la khru gang gyen du mtho ba dang
T02D2576:41a-20: / de'i kha khyer yang de'i tshad du byas la /
T02D2576:41a-21: de nas nang du khru phyed kyi bar du zabs
T02D2576:41a-22: su rgyar chung bar byas la nang gi zabs su
T02D2576:41a-23: yang khru gang thab khung bya'o //
T02D2576:41a-24: de la rdo rje dkar po dang /
T02D2576:41a-27: rin po che ser po dang /
T02D2576:41a-29: rgya gram ljang gus bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2576:41a-30: de la tsandan dang rgya shug la sogs pa dug
T02D2576:41a-31: gi rgyu las ma byung ma skyes pa'i shing sogs
T02D2576:41a-32: te / de'i nang gang yin pa der sems can
T02D2576:41a-33: gang dag tshe 'phos pa de'i gzugs kyi phung po
T02D2576:41a-34: khrus byas la dris bsgos te /
T02D2576:41a-35: rgyan btags la skyil mo krung gi tshul du kha nub tu phyogs bar bzhag la /
T02D2576:41a-36: steng dang phyogs mtshams su ku shas g-yogs la gzhag go //
T02D2576:41a-37: de nas g-yon du bsang chu dang /
T02D2576:41a-38: mchod yon gzhag cing mchod pa lnga bkram nas /
T02D2576:41a-45: ku sha dang d'ur ba dang /
T02D2576:41a-56: au dum b'a ra'i shing dang /
T02D2576:41a-57: nags kyi lcug ma rlan dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2576:41b-0: zas kyi rnam pa srog chags las ma @41b byung ba dang /
T02D2576:41b-1: mchog tu dri dang bcas pa'i sreg rdzas rnams ku
T02D2576:41b-2: sha gcal tu bkram pa'i steng du shing lo bzang
T02D2576:41b-3: po 'am ras sar pa'i steng du gzhag go /
T02D2576:41b-4: mdun du dgang gzar blugs gzar gzhag go / de
T02D2576:41b-5: ltar rdzas rnams tshogs par byas la /
T02D2576:41b-6: bdag rdo rje slob dpon gyi rgyan rnams bgo ste /
T02D2576:41b-7: rdo rje dril bu bzung la ma rungs pa 'dul
T02D2576:41b-8: ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po dran pa'i byin
T02D2576:41b-9: rlabs kyis log 'dren gyi tshogs gang yin pa de
T02D2576:41b-10: rnams pham par byas nas cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i
T02D2576:41b-12: de nas sdig pa byang zhing dge ba la 'dun pa bzang po bskyed de /
T02D2576:41b-13: skal ba dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir nges par byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02D2576:41b-14: de'i rjes la bdag nyid shin tu sbyangs pa dang
T02D2576:41b-15: ldan pas sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon par byang chub
T02D2576:41b-16: pa'i snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T02D2576:41b-17: par zhugs te / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mngon
T02D2576:41b-18: par sbrul nas sems can thams cad kyi ngan pa
T02D2576:41b-19: song yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2576:41b-20: de nas 'byung ba bzhi las nges par byung ba'i
T02D2576:41b-21: dkyil 'khor brtseg go / gzugs kyi khog pa gang
T02D2576:41b-22: yin pa las nges par 'byung ba'i me thabs kyi
T02D2576:41b-23: 'khor lo // de'i nang du me'i dkyil 'khor zur
T02D2576:41b-24: gsum pa dbus su ram gyis mtshan cing zur gsum
T02D2576:41b-25: la khams gsum gyi las dang nyon mongs pa zhal
T02D2576:41b-26: du gsol ba'i rtags aom a'a: h'um gsum yid kyis
T02D2576:41b-27: 'khor lo // bris te / bram ze shin tu sbyangs pa'i khyim nas me blangs la /
T02D2576:41b-28: badzra dzva la ram zhes brjod cing rlung yab kyis g-yabs te /
T02D2576:41b-29: ku sha la me sbar nas de'i byin rlabs kyis
T02D2576:41b-30: gong gi yi ge gang yin pa las bskyed pa'i
T02D2576:41b-31: me lha'i rgyal po bha ba ka dung dang kun
T02D2576:41b-33: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la nges par rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2576:41b-36: bgrang phreng dang me thab bsnams pa bsgom mo //
T02D2576:41b-37: de nas sngas pas me lha bha ba ka spyan drangs te /
T02D2576:41b-38: aom tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02D2576:41b-39: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas 'di bzhes la //
T02D2576:41b-40: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2576:41b-41: aom ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de ba
T02D2576:41b-42: ri shi r'a dza satva mah'a kro dhi a'a: h'um
T02D2576:41b-43: / ma h'a y'a ma na ni hi to bha ba aom /
T02D2576:41b-44: bha ba ka aagna ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2576:41b-45: zhes spyan drangs la mchod yon dbul ba ni /
T02D2576:42a-0: @42a * // aom bha ba ka aagna ye ga ga na ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2576:42a-2: aom bha ba ka aagni dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2576:42a-3: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D2576:42a-4: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2576:42a-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan cing /
T02D2576:42a-6: aom badzra aagna ye ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la
T02D2576:42a-7: sarba bha smim ku ru sarba dusht'a na kro dha
T02D2576:42a-8: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stam /
T02D2576:42a-9: aa h'um zhes brjod pas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab cing /
T02D2576:42a-10: de la dbang bskur sbyin no //
T02D2576:42a-11: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2576:42a-12: aom bha ba ka badzra aagna ye badzra pushpam zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2576:42a-14: de nas thog mar me'i gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir mar gyi dgang blugs bdun nam lnga dbul lo //
T02D2576:42a-15: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva
T02D2576:42a-16: la sarba bhasmim ku ru sarba dusht'a na h'um phat
T02D2576:42a-17: ces brjod la me'i mdog legs par brtags te /
T02D2576:42a-19: ma chad ma bye mi 'phro dang //
T02D2576:42a-20: sgra dang du ba kun du spangs //
T02D2576:42a-21: 'jam la rno zhing gsal na bzang //
T02D2576:42a-22: gnag cing rtsub pa ngan pa dang //
T02D2576:42a-25: ngan na de'i bar chad zhi bar byas la /
T02D2576:42a-26: de nas yam shing dbul te /
T02D2576:42a-27: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la sarba smi gu ru sarba dusht'a na /
T02D2576:42a-28: bha ba ka aagna ye badzra ma ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-30: de bzhin du kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2576:42a-31: tshe las 'das pa che ge mo sarba p'a pam da ha na ya sv'a h'a til gyi'o //
T02D2576:42a-32: tshe las 'das pa che ge mo sarba p'a pam dzva la ram sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-34: mar dang 'o ma dang zho la sogs pa zhu
T02D2576:42a-35: ba'i rdzas rnams ni me nyid kyi sngags kyis so
T02D2576:42a-36: // sarba sam ba de sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-40: aom aa par ti ha ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-42: aom ma h'a pe ga ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-44: aom badzra ghasma ri ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-46: aom badzra gi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-48: aom ma h'a ba la ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-50: aom badzra mu ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-52: aom sarba pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42a-54: aom mah'a sho pa ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:42b-0: 'bru'i rnam pa @42b dang sman gyi rnam pa zhal du'o //
T02D2576:42b-1: ku sha dang d'ur ba dbu'i gtsug tor du'o //
T02D2576:42b-2: mchod pa lnga'i tshul ji lta bu bzhin du'o //
T02D2576:42b-3: gnas gang dang gang yin pa der dbul lo //
T02D2576:42b-4: tha ma yang mchod pa lnga phul nas bstod pas bstod de /
T02D2576:42b-5: h'um 'jig rten dbang 'phyug tshangs pa mgon gyi sras //
T02D2576:42b-6: me lha'i rgyal po yongs kyis dbang bskur bas //
T02D2576:42b-7: shes rab me yis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /'jigs byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud //
T02D2576:42b-9: de nas 'dod pa'i don bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2576:42b-10: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong khyod //
T02D2576:42b-11: byon pa legs kyis don bsgrubs shig / sbyin sreg las kyi dngos grub stsol //
T02D2576:42b-12: mngon par phyogs pa de srid du //
T02D2576:42b-13: ji srid dgongs pa mdzad nas kyang //
T02D2576:42b-14: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2576:42b-17: de nas me 'bar ba'i nang du padma dang nyi
T02D2576:42b-18: ma'i steng na tshe 'das dbang po shin tu gsal
T02D2576:42b-20: rang gi gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bas snying
T02D2576:42b-21: ga'i 'od zer gyis tshe las 'das pa'i shes pa
T02D2576:42b-22: bstim zhing dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2576:42b-23: zhes pa'i sngags brjod la rigs drug gi gnas nas
T02D2576:42b-24: rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'khyams pa de snying
T02D2576:42b-25: ga'i aa thung ngu la nges par bcug nas /
T02D2576:42b-26: sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ste /
T02D2576:42b-27: aom aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes pa dang /
T02D2576:42b-28: aom sarba na ra ga te he tu h'um phat /
T02D2576:42b-29: aom sarba pre ta ga te he tu h'um phat /
T02D2576:42b-30: aom sarba tir ya ga te he tu h'um phat /
T02D2576:42b-31: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na pa tsa ga
T02D2576:42b-32: te he tu h'um phat tra ta zhes brjod la
T02D2576:42b-33: / tshogs bsags pa'i thabs la mos pa bskyed par bsams la sems bskyed de /
T02D2576:42b-34: de'i snying gar zla ba la rdo rje bsams la
T02D2576:42b-35: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das
T02D2576:42b-36: pa de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i rnam par smin
T02D2576:42b-37: pa thams cad bum pa'i chus bkru bar bya ste
T02D2576:42b-38: / aom aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes
T02D2576:42b-39: bya bas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku'i phreng
T02D2576:42b-40: / sngags dang / sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02D2576:42b-45: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne /
T02D2576:42b-46: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne /
T02D2576:42b-48: sarba karmma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2576:43a-0: zhes bya bas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang las kyi sdig pa thams @43a * //
T02D2576:43a-2: dag par bsams la de'i gzugs kyi phung po de yang stong zhing bdag med par bsam mo //
T02D2576:43a-3: de'i shes pa aa dkar por gnas par bsams la /
T02D2576:43a-4: de la dkyil 'khor rnams sprul par bya'o //
T02D2576:43a-5: de nas ye shes 'khor lo bar snang la bsdus te /
T02D2576:43a-6: yang dag par bltas te mchod nas dam tshig gi
T02D2576:43a-7: 'khor lo la gzhug cing mnyes par byas nas dbang
T02D2576:43a-8: bskur zhing mi 'da' ba'i rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2576:43a-9: de'i de ma thag tu dgang blags bdun nam gsum
T02D2576:43a-10: phul la yam shing sngon du 'gro bas ji skad
T02D2576:43a-11: gsungs pa bzhin sreg rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2576:43a-12: de'i rjes la sngar gyi lha gang yin pa de'i
T02D2576:43a-13: snying gar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
T02D2576:43a-14: gnas par byas la thun mong du sreg rdzas rnams
T02D2576:43a-16: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva
T02D2576:43a-17: la sarba bhasmi ku ru sarba dusht'a na h'um phat
T02D2576:43a-18: aom bha ba ka aagna ye /
T02D2576:43a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2576:43a-22: bha ga b'a na dzny'a na m'urtti b'a g'i shva
T02D2576:43a-23: ra ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharmm'a ga ga na
T02D2576:43a-24: aa ma la su pa ri shuddhe dharma dh'a tu
T02D2576:43a-25: dzny'a na garbha a'a: tshe las 'das pa che ge
T02D2576:43a-26: mo'i sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra ye sv'a
T02D2576:43a-27: h'a / zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbul lo //
T02D2576:43a-28: mthar yang dgang blugs phul la yang dag par mchod nas bstod par bya'o //
T02D2576:43a-29: de nas 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02D2576:43a-30: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2576:43a-31: bstan pa'i gtso la mnga' mdzad pa //
T02D2576:43a-32: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi //
T02D2576:43a-33: sems can ngan song sbyor mdzad pa //
T02D2576:43a-34: bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2576:43a-36: ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol par bya'o //
T02D2576:43a-37: dam tshig rnams gtso bo la bsdu zhing gtso bo nyid kyang aa'i mthar thug pa la bsdu ste /
T02D2576:43a-38: rang gi shes pa aa'i rnam pa de chos kyi za ma tog gi nang du bzhag ste /
T02D2576:43a-39: ye shes chen po bzhi'i shing rta'i khar bzhag la
T02D2576:43a-40: rnam snang chen po'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rlung
T02D2576:43a-42: 'og min gyi gnas su rigs nges pa'i sangs rgyas su byas la gzhag go //
T02D2576:43a-43: de'i rjes la sreg rdzas lhag mas me lha nyid mchod la bstod pa byas te /
T02D2576:43a-44: tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras //
T02D2576:43a-45: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog / sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyir //
T02D2576:43b-0: thugs rje'i dbang gis sku @43b sprul pa //
T02D2576:43b-1: rigs kyi sgrub pa'i drang srong tshul //
T02D2576:43b-2: nyon mongs sreg pa'i shes rab 'od //
T02D2576:43b-3: bskal pa'i me ltar rab tu 'bar //
T02D2576:43b-4: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan //
T02D2576:43b-5: thabs kyi sprul pa'i theg pa bcibs //
T02D2576:43b-6: bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags bsrung //
T02D2576:43b-7: bdud rtsi bcud ldan gundhe bsnams //
T02D2576:43b-8: chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la smin //
T02D2576:43b-9: mi shes skyon bral tshangs par spyod //
T02D2576:43b-10: zhi bas mnyes shing thugs rje che //
T02D2576:43b-12: de la mnyes shing phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2576:43b-13: ces brjod la gshegs su gsol te //
T02D2576:43b-14: sems can ngan song sbyong ba yi //
T02D2576:43b-15: phrin las khyod kyis mdzad lags kyis //
T02D2576:43b-16: rang gi yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2576:43b-17: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2576:43b-18: aom bha ba ka aagna ye ae hye hi sa
T02D2576:43b-19: ham da dam tsa ti dha rmma tsa ya badzra
T02D2576:43b-20: mu:/ zhes pas ye shes pa gshegs //
T02D2576:43b-21: dam tshig gi me lha tha mal ltar bsdu'o //
T02D2576:43b-22: tshe 'das sgrub pa sreg pa'i thabs //
T02D2576:43b-23: cho ga bzang po byas pa las //
T02D2576:43b-24: bsags pa'i dge des 'gro ba kun //
T02D2576:43b-25: bde ba can du skye bar shog / slob dpon
T02D2576:43b-26: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'jam dpal gyi
T02D2576:43b-27: ro sreg pa'i cho ga rdzogs so //
T02D2576:43b-28: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
